trait.name: Cunning Action
entries: On each of its turns, the pale orc can use a bonus action to take the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action.

trait.name: Keen Hearing
entries: The pale orc has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing.

trait.name: Darkness Dweller
entries: The pale orc has disadvantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight, and are blinded while in bright light. Additionally, it can't use its blindsight while it is deafened.

trait.name: Precision Strike
entries: The pale orc deals an 2 extra dice of damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack (included in its attacks).

trait.name: Slayer
entries: In the first round of a combat, the pale orc has advantage on attack rolls against any creature that hasn't taken a turn yet. If the pale orc hits a creature that round who was surprised, the hit is automatically a critical hit.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The pale orc makes two scimitar or dart attacks.

action.name: Scimitar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 ({@dice 3d6+3}) slashing damage.

action.name: Dart
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 10 ({@dice 3d4+3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Veil of Shargaas (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: The pale orc casts {@spell darkness} without any components. Wisdom is its spellcasting ability.

trait.name: Aggressive
entries: As a bonus action, the orc can move up to its speed toward a hostile creature that it can see.

trait.name: Unarmored Defense
entries: While the pale orc is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, its AC includes its Wisdom modifier.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The pale orc makes four attacks, each of which can be an unarmed strike or a dart attack. It can also use Shadow Jaunt once, either before or after one of the attacks.

action.name: Unarmed Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 ({@dice 1d4+3}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Dart
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 5 ({@dice 1d4+3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Shadow Jaunt
entries: The pale orc magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space it can see. Both the space it is leaving and its destination must be in dim light or darkness.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
